definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: This algorithm can draw isobar accurately.
sentences.chinese: 該算法可精確地繪製出等壓線。

sentences.english: With the quotation of three pulse coefficients, the fluctuating turbine is regarded as isobaric turbine.

sentences.english: As an example, the isobars are plotted for strong detonation waves passing over a wedge surface.
sentences.chinese: 作爲例子，文中計算了強爆震波繞薄楔時的等壓線。

sentences.english: Pressure differences are indicated on weather maps by isobars.
sentences.chinese: 在氣象圖上氣壓差用等壓線表示。

sentences.english: The pressure equalized rain-screen (PER) walls were exactly proposed in this context.
sentences.chinese: 等壓雨幕牆正是在這一背景下誕生的。

sentences.english: Therefore, the equal pressure method and the sensing method will be the future trend.
sentences.chinese: 因此，等壓法和傳感法將是今後的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: A region of low pressure with roughly concentric isobars is known technically as a cyclone .
sentences.chinese: 具有大致同心的等壓線的低壓區在技術上稱爲氣旋。

sentences.english: On this basis, the new technology of thermal isobaric method steel plastic clad tube is developed.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上開發了熱等壓法鋼塑複合新技術。

sentences.english: Whereas, like isobaric means constant pressure.

sentences.chinese: 氣壓梯度與天氣圖上等壓線的間隔大小成反比。

sentences.english: Micropore filtration under constant driving pressure is a powerful tool for assessing the RBC deformability.
sentences.chinese: 等壓微孔過濾法是測定紅細胞變形性的重要手段。
